input: Can you give me the latest risk report for the system?
What are the current risk highlights for today?
I want to see the risk details as of now.
What's the risk level in the system right now?
Show me the most recent risk analysis.
What were the major risks in January 2023?
Can you give me a summary of the risk report for the whole of January 2023?
Tell me about the risk scores for the month of January 2023.
Today is February 1, 2023. What were the critical risks last month?
I need details on the risk report from January 1 to January 31, 2023.
What are the current risk statistics?
Can you give me a summary of the risk factors we're dealing with right now?
What's the latest on the risk statistics?
How do the risk levels look at the moment?
Could you provide an overview of the risk statistics as of today?
What are the risk statistics since the start of this year?
Can you give me the risk details from January 1, 2024, onwards?
Today is April 29, 2024. Please show me the risk statistics starting from the beginning of the year.
How have the risks changed since January 1, 2024?
Please let me know the risk factors from January 1 this year until now.
What are the risk statistics up to May 7, 2024?
